physical_appearance:This clipping is a page from the periodical \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly
\u0027 published on 19 May 1946. It includes six black-and-white photographs of cadet officers from the Indian National Army in Calcutta. The first photograph is of the I.N.A. Rest Camp. Underneath the photographs there are brief captions. The edges of the page are torn.

metadata.title_text: The Orient Weekly Calcutta works for the I. N. A.
metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly,' published on 19 May 1946. It includes six black-and-white photographs of cadet officers from the Indian National Army in Calcutta. The first photograph is of the I.N.A. Rest Camp. Underneath the photographs there are brief captions. The edges of the page are torn.
